name: Git Portfolio
desc: A personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase projects, skills, and certifications.

name: Weather APP
desc: A simple React-based weather app that fetches and displays real-time weather data using an external API.

name: E-Commerce
desc: A responsive React-based E-Commerce website featuring product listings, search functionality, and a clean modern UI.

name: aipersonaltrainer
desc: The AI Personal Trainer is a Python-based application that uses computer vision and machine learning to monitor and guide a user’s physical exercises. It helps users perform workouts with proper form by tracking their movements in real time and providing feedback—just like a human trainer.

name: Whatsapp Timer
desc: A Python-based tool that schedules and sends WhatsApp messages automatically at a specified time.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: A personal website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase projects, skills, and achievements in an interactive and responsive design.

name: College Website
desc: A user-friendly HTML, CSS, and JavaScript-based website for A.M. Reddy Engineering College, providing quick access to timetables, academic calendars, manuals, and study materials.

name: Feedback Forms
desc: A simple and responsive web portal built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to provide academic resources like timetables, calendars, manuals, and materials for students.
